section.title: Getting Started
section.para: The Embedded Version of Guvnor’s Editors lets you to use just the editor window inside your applications. So, basically what you need to do to is to embed just the editor you want to use in your web application using an iframe. In order to be able to invoke an Editor instance from an external application, Guvnor must be running: Standalone Editor is just a part of Guvnor and not a different application. The first step is to have Guvnor deployed and running in a web/application server.

Using the Embedded version of Guvnor’s Editor you can create or edit assets only inside existing categories and packages. You must configure at least one category and package with a valid model inside Guvnor to start working with this feature.
